description: Enterprise techniques used by Threat Group-1314, ATT&CK group G0028 v1.0
name: Threat Group-1314 (G0028)

techniques.comment: [Threat Group-1314](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0028) actors spawned shells on remote systems on a victim network to execute commands.
[Threat Group-1314](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0028) actors mapped network drives using net use.
[Threat Group-1314](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0028) actors used compromised credentials for the victim's endpoint management platform, Altiris, to move laterally.
[Threat Group-1314](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0028) actors used a victim's endpoint management platform, Altiris, for lateral movement.
